name: A Mover in Hell
description:
/!\ ART ARE ALL DRAW BY US EXCEPT THE BACKGROUND WITH THE HAUNTED HOUSE WHICH COME FROM : u/CaptainManboob (reddit)

MUSICS COME FROM ROYALTY FREE WEBSITES : "Funny bit" and "Castle of Fear" by David Renda.

GAME MADE BY Imergal AND JustAlternate

A Mover in Hell

Is all about a mover in a haunted manor...

Lore :

A Mover in Hell 

You're the most famous mover of your country and a client sent you to an... unusual manor... This manor is haunted and the furniture came to life with a cute face! Unfortunately, you hate cute little faces as you hate taxes! You have no choice but to kill them all in order to fullfill your job. Your job : Make the room EMPTY
